description: Try our easy to follow Chocolate Caramel & Hazelnut Slice recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Chocolate Caramel & Hazelnut Slice Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Melt chocolate in a heatproof bowl over simmering water, taking care base of bowl does not touch water. Stir until melted and smooth. Stir in oil. Pour chocolate over slice and, working quickly, spread evenly. Stand to set. Cut into squares and serve.
